description: Olof Palme was shot dead on Sweden's busiest road in 1986. Now, prosecutors may know who killed him.
title: Olof Palme: Who killed Sweden's prime minister?
title_page: Olof Palme: Who killed Sweden's prime minister? - BBC News
maintext: "It was almost as if you either loved or hated him," Ms Sundstrom said. "There was a very, very strong resentment, not least on the right of politics. Nowadays when we talk about the strong rhetoric on social media against politicians, all of that we already saw in Sweden during Palme's era. They went after him extremely hard."
